_header: Go forth mine own true heart innocent
_description: An Envoy to his mistress — three stanzas rhyme royal with refrain

BLAdd10303.First Lines:
ffayrest of fayer & goodlieste a lyveall my secre to you I
                    playne & shryve…
BLAdd10303.Last Lines:
…ffrom the grace of her whose lookes softemay gyve the the
                    blisse that thou desyers ofte
BLAdd10303.Note:
Four stanzas and refrain in this manuscript. Refrain is: ‘Ye that
                    this balade rede shall / I prey you kepe you ffrom the fall’.

Longleat256.Editions:
Jenkins,  Anthony,
                        ed.  
             The Isle of Ladies: or, The Ile of Pleasaunce.
Garland Medieval Texts
         2. New York: Garland, 1980.
